title: 98/450/EC: Commission Decision of 3 July 1998 amending Decision 97/586/EC on certain protective measures in respect of infectious anaemia in salmon in Norway (notified under document number C(1998) 1845) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 3 July 1998 amending Decision 97/586/EC on certain protective measures in respect of infectious anaemia in salmon in Norway (notified under document number C(1998) 1845) (Text with EEA relevance) (98/450/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision 97/586/EC is amended as follows:
1. in Article 5, the date '1 July 1998` shall be replaced by the date '1 July 1999`.
2. Annex I is replaced by the following text:
'ANNEX I
HOLDINGS AND ESTABLISHMENTS LOCATED ALONG THE NORWEGIAN COAST BETWEEN THE SWEDISH BORDER AND THE BORDER BETWEEN THE COMMUNES OF HĂ AND EIGERSUND FROM WHICH SLAUGHTERED, NON-EVISCERATED SALMON MAY BE DISPATCHED TO THE COMMUNITY
1. Holdings
>TABLE>
2. Establishments
>TABLE>
The Member States shall alter the measures they apply in trade in order to bring them into line with this Decision. They shall immediately inform the Commission thereof.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:

For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
